p: BHA is effective in inhibiting lipid oxidation in ground beef at 1% [ 3], but the addition of synthetic antioxidants is restricted by most of the current regulations both regarding their doses and products. For instance, the use of gallates, TBHQ and BHA, in the category of heat-treated meat products, is only allowed for dehydrated meat [ 4]. The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has established a limit of 0.02% of gallates because of suspicions of some toxic and possible carcinogenic effects associated with prolonged ingestion [ 5, 6, 7].
